law.catch_line: In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated....

text.section: In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated.

section.section: "County roads authority" means the governmental entity that has control of the public roads of a county.
"County roads authority" includes, in a county in which the board of county commissioners has control of the public roads of the county, the board of county commissioners.

text.section: "Public roads" includes highways, roads, bridges, and streets under the jurisdiction of the State or a county or municipal corporation of the State.
